GR13jssivppu:1: dvārasyārcanayāgadhāmagatavighnodvāsanādyaiḥ prabhor yaḥ śrīmānyajanaṃ karoti bhavatastasyaiva siddhidvayam // JsSpst_1 //
GR13jssivppu:2: ekaivārthata īśaśaktiramitā yānekarūpā śivā kālopādhivaśāddvijāstvanudinaṃ brāhmyādirūpeṇa tām /
GR13jssivppu:3: dhyāyantyatra tu nirmalātmaśivayoḥ sandhiśca śaivī purā sandhyātaḥ śiva eva sādhakavarairdhyeyaḥ sadā nirmalaḥ // JsSpst_2 //
GR13jssivppu:5: dhyeyaṃ sadā munivarairapavargasiddhyai viśvātmakaṃ sadasadantamanantamīśam // JsSpst_3 //
GR13jssivppu:7: śambhuṃ sadoditamamāyaviyatsvarūpaṃ kodaṇḍamadhyanilayaṃ niyataṃ smarāmi // JsSpst_4 //
GR13jssivppu:9: bodhāmṛtaṃ karaṇakāraṇakāryahīnaṃ taṃ brahmarandhranilayaṃ niyataṃ smarāmi
GR13jssivppu:15: śaivajñānaprasiddhapravaravidhigatāśeṣasatkṛtyakārī jīvaṃ hṛdyeva kuryādraviśaśidahanavyomaśaktyantarastham āyāmaiḥ śvanasya bhautikamalaṃ dehaṃ kalābhiḥ sudhīr yaḥ pañcādhvavisarpiṇībhiraniśaṃ saṃśodhya tacchambaraiḥ /
GR13jssivppu:16: mantrālaṅkṛtadehabhṛnniśi divā sandhyāsu santoṣayann arcāhomasamādhibhiḥ śivamasau saṃyāti śaivaṃ padam // JsSpst_8 //
GR13jssivppu:17: ya eṣa devo mahato mahīyān aṇoraṇīyānbhavabhīrubhiḥ saḥ /
GR13jssivppu:18: jñeyaḥ śivaḥ sarvagataḥ śarīre dhyeyaḥ sa pūjyaḥ śivaliṅgamadhye //
GR13jssivppu:20: hṛtpadmākhyaśivālaye manasije tatkarṇikākhye kriyāpīṭhe jñānamayaṃ viśuddhamanasā saṃsthāpya nādātmanā /
GR13jssivppu:21: liṅgaṃ tacca sudhāmayena payasā saṃsnāpya samyakpuno vairāgyeṇa ca candanena vasubhiḥ puṣpairahiṃsādibhiḥ prāṇāyāmabhavena dhūpavidhinā ciddīpadānena yaḥ pratyāhāramayena somahaviṣā sauṣumnajāpena ca /
GR13jssivppu:22: taccitte bahudhāraṇābhiramaladhyānodbhavairbhūṣaṇais tatsāmyāṇinivedanena yajate dhanyaḥ sa evāmalaḥ // JsSpst_11 //
GR13jssivppu:23: candrasrāvisudhāmayena haviṣā nābhisthakuṇḍe 'nalaṃ santarpyeśamayaṃ śivāspadagatavyomni sthite sarvage /
GR13jssivppu:24: kandodbhūtaśivāṇunādaśikhayā vṛttyātmasaṃvedanaṃ śaive jyotiṣi yaḥ karoti puruṣo muktaḥ sa evākṣayaḥ // JsSpst_12 //
GR13jssivppu:28: gātrakaṃ chadanadvayaṃ kamalaṃ sakesarakarṇikaṃ śaktimaṇḍalasaṅghayuktamahaṃ namāmi śivāsanam pṛthvīkandaṃ kālatattvāntanālaṃ lokaughaṃ tatkaṇṭakaṃ bhāvasūtram /
GR13jssivppu:31: tatra sthitaṃ hṛdayamantragatātmamantra- mūrtiṃ ca bindugatamīśamahaṃ
GR13jssivppu:33: tatkandaṃ śatakoṭiyojanamitaṃ nālaṃ parārdhāntakaṃ granthiḥ koṭiparārdhapaścimasahasro 'bjaṃ ca tallakṣakam /*
GR13jssivppu:34: mūrtistasya ca koṭirīśvaramayī tasyārbudasyārbudāmbhojaṃ mantramayaṃ sadāśivavapustadvānameyaḥ śivaḥ // JsSpst_17 //*
GR13jssivppu:35: yasyāmauṣadhabhūṣaṇadhvanimayī mūrtiḥ parā baindavī dhyeyā śaṅkaramantratantraniratairjñānakriyāṅgī śivā /
GR13jssivppu:36: sarvaiśvaryasukhapradā nirupamā sādāśivī nirmalā nādākhyāya sadāśivāya mahate śāntāya tasmai namaḥ // JsSpst_18 //
GR13jssivppu:40: bhūtāmbhorāśisiddhismarabhujagakalākḷptadehaḥ kriyecchā- dṛṅmāsārdhāmbakaṃ taṃ kabilagatamahaṃ naumi vidyāśarīram // JsSpst_20 //
GR13jssivppu:42: aikyānmantrārthayorityakhilaśivamateṣvāhasarvārthahetur vaktrāṇāṃ varṇabhedaścidacidadhipateścitrametatsvarūpam īśānena viyanmayena dhavalaprakhyena sarvaprabhor vyāptaṃ vaktracatuṣṭayaṃ puruṣahṛdguhyājamantrātmakam
GR13jssivppu:43: tenedaṃ dhavalaprabhaṃ śivavidaḥ pūrvādikāṣṭhābhṛtāṃ varṇānugrahahetutaḥ pratimukhaṃ pītādivarṇaṃ viduḥ // JsSpst_22 //
GR13jssivppu:48: bodhānandamayī vibhorbhavabhayapradhvaṃsakṛcchaktayas tisrastāḥ pariṇāmataśca vivṛtirniḥśeṣabījasya hi /
GR13jssivppu:49: tapūrṇaṃ prakṛtiḥ kalādyabhimukhī dīrghākṣasūtraṃ manaḥ śambhorastranikāya āgamaparairjñeyaḥ paro nāparaḥ // JsSpst_25 //
GR13jssivppu:55: (this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā)
GR13jssivppu:57: vāmaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ raudraṃ kalavikaraṇaṃ balavikaraṇaṃ kāntam /*
GR13jssivppu:59: (this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā)
GR13jssivppu:61: (this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā)
GR13jssivppu:65: bodhānandamayāya sarvavibhave nityāya viśvātmane śuddhāyāmalatejase ca mahate tasmai parasmai namaḥ // JsSpst_31 //
GR13jssivppu:72: sāṃśumattriśikhadvibimbagatadvikubjaga unmanā pātu vaḥ sakalāparaḥ sakalākalaḥ sakalaḥ śivaḥ niṣkalaṃ śivarudrapudgalabhūṣaṇārdhahimāṃśumad-
GR13jssivppu:74: śaṅkaraṃ vasusāgarāṅgulacāriṇaṃ rasaśūnyagaṃ sarvamantrapatiṃ prāsādamahaṃ nato 'smi ṣaḍadhvagam cidvyaktisaṃsthityavalokarodhair mudrottarairaṅgaśivaikabhāvaiḥ /*
GR13jssivppu:76: āvāhanaṃ svātmani citprakāśas tatra sthitiḥ sthāpanamīśvarasya /*
GR13jssivppu:84: snānaṃ svātmamalāpahaṃ śubhamayairgandhaiḥ samālepanaṃ sadvastrābharaṇaṃ sugandhikusumairmālābhirabhyarcanam
GR13jssivppu:85: sālaṅkārasadāśivasya vidhivaddhūpapradānaṃ tvaṇor bhogārthaṃ hi sadeśadhāmni vimalaṃ dīpaṃ śivajñānadam // JsSpst_40 //
GR13jssivppu:89: bhogāṅgārcanamātmanaḥ śivaguṇaprāptyarthamaikyaṃ prabhor aṅgānāṃ punararcakasya śivasaṃyogāya śuddhātmanaḥ /
GR13jssivppu:90: tṛptasyānnanivedanāmbumukhavāsādipradānaṃ manas- tṛptyarthaṃ śivabhāvamaṅgalakaraṃ citraṃ tatrārcāphalam // JsSpst_42 //
GR13jssivppu:93: arcane sakalaṃ jape sakalākalaṃ satatoditaṃ niṣkalaṃ sakalādhvagaṃ paripūrṇamātmasamarpaṇe
GR13jssivppu:94: vyomni susphaṭikaprabhaṃ bhavane kalāsahitaṃ haraṃ yo hi vetti paraṃ śivaṃ śiva eva so 'stra na saṃśayaḥ // JsSpst_44 //
GR13jssivppu:95: bhūyaḥ pūjanamīśasannidhikaraṃ samprārthanaṃ sveśayor anyonyaṃ tvavalokanāya bhuvane bhogāya sādāśive /
GR13jssivppu:96: īśāgnyarcanamarpaṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ bandhatrayaṃ karmaṇo jñeyaṃ svātmanivedanaṃ paraśive sthityarthamevātmanaḥ aśuddhatattvaughabahiṣkriyārthaṃ parāṅmukhārghyaṃ parameśvarasya /
GR13jssivppu:97: yasminnavasthānakaraṃ visargaṃ kurvansa śaivaṃ padamabhyupeti // JsSpst_46
GR13jssivppu:99: siddhāntajño jñānaśambhuḥ śivoktyā cakre bhaktyā bhuktaye muktaye ca //
